name: Meowbahh Simulator
description:
Welcome to Meowbahh Simulator. A game where Meowbahh is in school computer lab and you get to control what Meowbahh does in School. You can make Meowbahh drink drinks, break the fourth wall, fart in class, and more.

Game made by Idiot Creature Hater Studios. The same people who made Lisa Gaming Roblox OS.

NOTICE: This game may contain some moderate language. If you think you will get offended by such content, please leave.

This game is currently in a demo and early access release. Things are subject to change for the final full release. The demo is for the 4th Wall Broken - Game Jam 2023. Jam is here.
